import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update issue"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/{issueId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing issue definition by ID. Use this to rename issues, change their type/category metadata, or adjust visibility settings.

**Prerequisites**
1. **issueId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/list-issues) or [POST /api/v1.0/issues](/docs/api/issues/search-issues) and extract `Items[].IssueId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load the issue: [GET /api/v1.0/issues/\{issueId\}](/docs/api/issues/get-issue-by-id).
2. Modify the fields in the `Issue` payload.
3. Save changes: [POST /api/v1.0/issues/\{issueId\}](/docs/api/issues/update-issue).

**Minimal Required Fields**: issueId (path) plus at least one field to update (commonly `Name` or `IssueTypeId`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"issueId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
